title: Wanda Sykes | Corrupt Republicans Shredded the Supreme Court's Legitimacy with Roe Ruling: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Republicans shamelessly claiming Democrats are staging "riots" by peacefully protesting amid national outrage and widespread protests over the Supreme Court's grotesque decision to shred abortion rights. Then, Wanda Sykes talks about the relatability of her Netflix series The Upshaws, her wife and kids taking advantage of her inability to speak French and celebrating Pride on Fire Island.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
